org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.LDAPClientContext

  • Packages that use LDAPClientContext 
    Package Description
    com.forgerock.opendj.grizzly
    Classes implementing Grizzly transport provider.
    com.forgerock.reactive
    Provides asynchronous stream processing with non-blocking back pressure.
    org.forgerock.opendj.grizzly
    Provides an implementation of a transport provider using Grizzly as transport.
    org.forgerock.opendj.ldap
    Classes and interfaces for core types including connections, entries, and attributes.
    org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.spi
    Interfaces and classes for service providers.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void LDAPClientContextEventListener.handleConnectionClosed​(LDAPClientContext context, UnbindRequest unbindRequest)
      Invoked when the client closed the connection, possibly using an unbind request.
      void LDAPClientContextEventListener.handleConnectionDisconnected​(LDAPClientContext context, ResultCode resultCode, String diagnosticMessage)
      Invoked when the connection has been disconnected by the server.
      void LDAPClientContextEventListener.handleConnectionError​(LDAPClientContext context, Throwable error)
      Invoked when the connection has been disconnected because of an error (e.g: message too big).
